
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/ShimonWang/p/18948877" title="发布于 2025-06-25 21:41">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">SolidWorks Flexnet Serve 正在启动...</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h1 id="solidworks-flexnet-serve-正在启动">SolidWorks Flexnet Serve 正在启动...</h1>
<h2 id="解决方案">解决方案</h2>
<p>设置-&gt;主页-&gt;电脑名称改成英文</p>
<p>电脑重启</p>
<h2 id="具体流程">具体流程</h2>
<p>事情是这样，当我在安装solidworks2022时候发现SolidWoks Flexnet Server服务正在启动...，然后就一直启动中，</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3153129/202506/3153129-20250625213856354-1588842.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3153129/202506/3153129-20250625213952821-1156728686.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>然后报错 NET HELPMSG 3534。然后我就尝试 <a href="https://blog.csdn.net/Butterfly_resting/article/details/89241058" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">启动MySQL服务时出现的NET HELPMSG 3534问题</a>，巴拉巴拉整了一堆，全是MySOL东西。最后我搜索solidworks net helpmsg 3534，在一个犄角旮旯找到了一个俄语论坛平台一个评论区发现了解决方法。 <a href="https://otvet.mail.ru/question/218786473" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">SolidWorks Flexnet Server启动</a> 原来是电脑名称不是中文...</p>
<p>电脑重启</p>
<p>最终服务显示可以正常启动</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3153129/202506/3153129-20250625213834724-1181784860.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
